title: Mathieu van der Poel, the one-day racer of his generation? ‘This almost completes my career’
content:
Road race world title sees the Dutch ace step closer to owning one of the most complete one-day palmarès of the modern peloton.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel, the one-day racer of his generation? ‘This almost completes my career’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
